list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long, narrow flat-bottomed boat, square at both ends and propelled with a long pole, used on inland waters chiefly for recreation.
an act of punting a ball.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Wood failed to cut out a long punt from Nicholas
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Gỗ không thể cắt ra một punt dài từ nicholas

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the basic monetary unit of the Republic of Ireland (until replaced by the euro), equal to 100 Irish pence.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: in summer you can enjoy punting along the river
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Vào mùa hè, bạn có thể tận hưởng những kẻ trừng phạt dọc theo sông

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: kick (the ball) after it is dropped from the hands and before it reaches the ground.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he used to be able to punt a football farther than anyone
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã từng có thể bỏ một quả bóng đá xa hơn bất cứ ai

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in some gambling card games) place a bet against the bank.
